name: Abom Demo
description:
How to play 

Move Around - WASD or Hold both mouse buttons down 

Look Around - Hold RIGHT/ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON and move mouse 

Target Enemies - Left click on them

Target Allied Aboms - 1, 2, 3, 4

Interact (pick up items) - E

Heal Aboms - Have the abom targeted and press R

Aboms Attack - Have an enemy targted and press R 

Open Inventory - I 

Open Settings - Esc, P

I stream development on Twitch, 9-5 Monday to Friday GMT.
